name: prd-discovery
description: Deep product discovery session — a senior product strategist AI that asks provocative questions, challenges assumptions, maps user flows, eliminates uncertainty, and produces a PRD-ready Discovery Canvas
postMessage:
PRD Discovery skill installed!

To start a discovery session:
  1. Open Claude Code or Claude Desktop
  2. The skill loads automatically from .claude/skills/prd-discovery/
  3. Say: "Let's start a discovery session" or "I want to figure out what to build"

The AI will guide you through a structured brainstorming and requirements gathering process.
At the end you'll have a Discovery Canvas — a structured document ready for PRD authoring.

For ChatGPT: Copy the contents of .claude/skills/prd-discovery/SKILL.md into your Custom Instructions or system prompt.
